actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Submission of a concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that all instrumentalities of the Federal Government should use all practicable means to bring inflation under control.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that all departments, agencies, and instrumentalities of the Federal Government should recognize their continuing responsibility, in carrying out the national policy of promoting maximum employment, production, and purchasing power concurrently to use all practicable means to achieve the national goal of reasonable price stability.

titles.title: Submission of a concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that all instrumentalities of the Federal Government should use all practicable means to bring inflation under control.
